abstract: Stephen Colbert experiments with new formats and styles in effort to attract broader audience for his program The Late Show with Stephen Colbert; hopes live broadcasts following presidential debates will revive flagging ratings as they did during Republican and Democratic National Conventions.

headline.print_headline: Fixing a TV Show on the Fly
headline.main: Stephen Colbert Reboots ‘The Late Show,’ Fixing It on the Fly

keywords.value: Late Show with Stephen Colbert (TV Program)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: In the battle against Jimmy Fallon and Jimmy Kimmel, Mr. Colbert is taking a hands-on approach that includes more topical humor and live episodes....
lead_paragraph: In the battle against Jimmy Fallon and Jimmy Kimmel, Mr. Colbert is taking a hands-on approach that includes more topical humor and live episodes.
